name: BaseRequest

methods.name: BaseRequest
methods.signature: global Void BaseRequest(String AdditionalData, Map<String, String> IdempotencyKey)

params.name: IdempotencyKey
params.description: Contains additional data that may be required for a payment request. The additionalData object consists of key-value pairs. You can retrieve the additionalData object from the request object: Map<String, String> additionalData=request.additionalData  Unique value that's generated by a client and sent to the server in the  request. The server stores the value and uses the it to keep track of the request status.

description: BaseRequest is extended by all the request classes.
